Components

Buttons

Default button elements, along with various modifier classes for different colors, sizes, etc. The .buttons wrapper is used to display multiple buttons next to each other, and includes modifiers for different alignments.

A11y pro tips:

  • A <button> doesn't need anything special to work. ARIA's role="button" is already assigned natively.
  • If you are using a link as a button, add the role="button" attribute.
  • Add class="visuallyhidden" with descriptive text to give more context to the button's purpose.
Link Buttonabout the topic this article is pertaining to.
.buttons--center
modifier for centered buttons
Link Buttonabout the topic this article is pertaining to.
.buttons--right
modifier for right aligned buttons
Link Buttonabout the topic this article is pertaining to.

List

This is a list component.

Sample List component

This is the first title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

This is the second title

Donec tristique varius tortor, a rutrum mauris rhoncus venenatis.

This is the third title

Etiam ac mauris vitae ante vulputate convallis non eu orci.

Sample List component

  • This is the first title: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  • This is the second title: Donec tristique varius tortor, a rutrum mauris rhoncus venenatis.
  • This is the third title: Etiam ac mauris vitae ante vulputate convallis non eu orci.

Read More

Default button elements, along with various modifier classes for different colors, sizes, etc. The .buttons wrapper is used to display multiple buttons next to each other, and includes modifiers for different alignments.

A11y pro tips:

  • Add id selectors to titles and use aria-labelledby="" to link to the title text (example #1).
  • Add decriptive text with aria-label="" directly in the link (example #2).
  • Turn read more links into buttons, when you can.

Example #1

Storms Hit East Coast

Torrential rain and gale force winds have struck the east coast, causing flooding in many coastal towns. Read More

Example #2

Black Bears Trapped in Cars?

Over the past three weeks there have been 15 reports or black bears getting themselves trapped in vehicles. There are several ways to prevent this from happening to you. Read More
